text: Larry Neil Vanderhoef (March 20, 1941 â€“ October 15, 2015) was an American biochemist and academic. He was the 5th chancellor of University of California, Davis serving from 1994 through 2009. He was born in Perham, Minnesota. Vanderhoef died on October 15, 2015 from complications of a stroke in Davis, California, aged 74. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American biochemists Category:Educators from Minnesota Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Scientists from Minnesota
title: Larry N. Vanderhoef
